Name: Teleportation Node
Description:
Universal production structure for the Directorate army, capable of deploying any combat units.

Enables:
- Garmrs
- Strike Troopers
- Enrichment Towers

Production.Description:
Highly-trained Directorate infantry.

Can attack ground and air units.
Production.Name: Strike Trooper

Production.Description:
Master of ideological warfare. Can inspire troops around her to fight harder, and is also equipped with Strike Grenades.

Can attack ground and air units.
Production.Name: Political Advisor

Production.Description:
Combat medic. Capable of reanimating deceased Directorate infantry.

Can attack ground units.
Production.Name: Lazarus

Production.Description:
Genetically engineered monstrosity. Its fiery breath is effective against lightly-armored targets, and it can tunnel through the ground to cross vast distances quickly.

Can attack ground units.
Production.Name: Garmr

Production.Description:
Heavily-armed infantry, effective against clustered targets.

Can attack ground units.
Production.Name: Taranis

Production.Description:
Versatile main battle tank, effective against lightly-armored targets.

Can attack ground units.
Production.Name: Napoleon MBT

Production.Description:
Infantry armored personnel carrier, from the inside you can attack only ground targets and from a maximum distance of 5. When the Drakkar is destroyed, the soldiers inside do not die and safely leave the car.

Can attack ground targets.
Production.Name: Drakkar APC

Production.Description:
Artillery vehicle. Supports the offensive with devastating missile salvos.

Can attack ground and air units.
Production.Name: Typhoon LMT

Production.Description:
Long-range artillery. Launches missiles that deal devastating damage in the target area, but can potentially be avoided.

Can attack ground units.
Production.Name: Peenemunde MRLS

Production.Description:
Advanced armored unit, equipped with heavy composite armor, powerful primary cannon and long-range ATGMs.

Can attack ground units.
Production.Name: Citadel AAT

Production.Description:
Autonomous combat drone. It is extremely effective when storming fortifications.

Can attack ground targets.
Production.Name: Huracan

Production.Description:
Low-altitude scouting drone.

There is a detection function
Production.Name: Crimson Eye

Production.Description:
Armored multirole fighter.

Can attack ground units.
Production.Name: Strikefighter

Production.Description: Large transport ship, capable of transporting big squads of infantry & armored vehicles.
Production.Name: Transport Shuttle

Production.Description: Combat support ship. Can use Cloaking Drone that temporarily cloaks the targeted unit, and is capable of deploying Psionic Suppression Field that prevents any abilities in the area from being cast.
Production.Name: Support Shuttle

Production.Description:
Dedicated AA corvette, capable of eliminating entire squadrons with a single salvo.

Can attack air units.
Production.Name: Valkyrie

Production.Description:
Versatile screening ship.

Can attack ground and air units.
Production.Name: Honorguard

Producers.Description: UED engineering vehicle. Can be deployed at a specified site in order to calldown Operation Headquarters from orbit.
Producers.Name: UED Beacon

Producers.Description:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Capable of deploying all UED structures aside from additional Operation Headquarters.

Enables:
- Salvagers
- Beacons
Producers.Name: Operation Headquarters

Commands.Tooltip: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Commands.Name: Set Rally Point

Commands.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Commands.Name: Cancel

Commands.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Commands.Name: Cancel
